docs.snippet: Institutional investors anxious not to be left out of this year's marquee initial public offering helped Snap Inc pull off the biggest U.S.-listed technology share sale this week since Chinese e-commerce juggernaut Alibaba Group Holding Inc smashe...
docs.lead_paragraph: Institutional investors anxious not to be left out of this year's marquee initial public offering helped Snap Inc pull off the biggest U.S.-listed technology share sale this week since Chinese e-commerce juggernaut Alibaba Group Holding Inc smashed records in 2014.

headline.main: Investors See Snap's IPO as 'Too Big to Fail'

docs.snippet: Tens of millions of dollars in royalties and signing bonuses that Glencore told an independent transparency board it had paid to Congo's state mining company actually went to a business controlled by Israeli billionaire Dan Gertler, advocacy group...
docs.lead_paragraph: Tens of millions of dollars in royalties and signing bonuses that Glencore told an independent transparency board it had paid to Congo's state mining company actually went to a business controlled by Israeli billionaire Dan Gertler, advocacy group Global Witness said in a report on Friday.

headline.main: Mining Royalties Glencore Said Were for Congo Went to Israeli Billionaire
headline.print_headline: Mining Royalties Glencore Said Were for Congo Went to Israeli Billionaire

docs.snippet: The 19-country eurozone economy is growing at its fastest rate since 2011, according to a survey released Friday, but few economists expect the European Central Bank to ease up on its stimulus efforts anytime soon given political uncertainties tha...
docs.lead_paragraph: The 19-country eurozone economy is growing at its fastest rate since 2011, according to a survey released Friday, but few economists expect the European Central Bank to ease up on its stimulus efforts anytime soon given political uncertainties that could derail the recovery.

headline.main: Eurozone Growth Running at Fastest Rate Since 2011
headline.print_headline: Eurozone Growth Running at Fastest Rate Since 2011
